title: We Need To Talk About Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Guy Rocourt is President, CEO and co-founder of Papa & Barkley, a pillar of California cannabis brands set to roll out nationally this year and recently joined Christian Cannabis. Pushing back on problematic corporate cannabis. Building a brand with solventless sustainable products. Why many MSOs aren't in California - a branding knife fight. Normalizing cannabis - if you use cannabis, say something.
